reviewtext: Sound quality is ok for the low price. The highs are not much better than the ipod earbuds and bass is about the same. They fit comfortably, and i can wear glasses when using them which is a plus (no ear pinching). The price is the only reason to buy these, and I only use them so I don't have to stuff nicer headphones in my backpack or risk breaking nice headphones when biking or snowboarding. They aren't very sensitive (you gotta turn the volume up a lot to get them loud) but they have been durable for some time now.
